article_title: One Bad Law Usually Leads To Others: The Housing Bubble and Dodd-Frank

article_metadata.author: George Leef

og.description: Let’s start with a pop quiz. Here’s the question. The housing bubble was caused by: a)    The boundless greed of Wall Street fat cats b)   The natural instability of markets under capitalism c)    Deregulation d)   Foolish laws passed as long ago as the 1930s Putting the possible answers that way is almost cruel to those who [...]
